solution_line_template: Jennifer has a total of {green_sweets} + {blue_sweets} + {yellow_sweets} = <<{green_sweets}+{blue_sweets}+{yellow_sweets}={total_sweets}>>{total_sweets} sweets.
Jennifer and her friends will get {total_sweets}/{num_people} = <<{total_sweets}/{num_people}={sweets_per_person}>>{sweets_per_person} sweets each.
